item.title: Hugo and RobotsTxt
item.description: How Hugo support RobotsTxt Config config.toml enableRobotsTXT = true # production or non-production, usually production env would allow search engine to crawl everything [params].env = "production" run hugo command to generate the web site a robots.txt will be generated in public directory robots.txt templates are existing in layouts/robots.txt file, or themes/ananke/layouts/robots.txt file the templates would affects the content of the generated public/robots.

item.title: Google Analytics
item.description: Google Analytics It is used to help you understand how your web site are accessing. With it, you can learn which part of your web is good, or bad; you can know how many user was/are accessing your web, where are they from….; then you can improve the website accordingly. It is also for Android app, and iOS app.
